item.description: Friday night out. Meet new people, get to know each other and go from here. Share food cost, Chinese & Japanese. Please response by Wed 2/21 so I can make reservation. Like to limit to 12 people due to the restaurant size, but not a hard limit. Let's see how it goes. Just join meetup an hour :-)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: First contact - meet new friends over dinner & drinks
